name: update_change
code:
def update_change(change: dict):
    """ID: 15c4a2ad-7c68-4189-ae07-53c008039503"""
    for key, change in change.items():
        scopens = self.get_scope_ns(key)
        if not scopens:
            return
        scope: ScopeItem = self.scope_manager.get_scope(scopens)
        if not scope:
            return
        field = key[len(scopens) + 1:]
        defi: Definition = self.def_manager.get(key)
        if not defi:
            defi = self.def_manager.create(
                key, utils.constants.NAME_DEF)
        defi.add_value_point(
            node.lineno, change.get_last_point_value())
        scope.add_def(field, defi)
    pass
